name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Deerfield Beach I-95

reviews.title: Good Value
reviews.text: I stayed here for a week in July '04. Pros: staff is very accommodating (if you have a problem with your room, they'll fix it, no questions asked); the breakfast is better-than-average for a Continental free breakfast; the location is convenient; the rooms are comfortable; the pool is nice and well-kept; the parking lot and hotel seem safe; they have a free hourly shuttle that takes you to Deerfield Beach and 6 or 7 other stops; the hotel is a few hundred yards from Tri Rail; the area is quiet at night; the staff is friendly; there is ample shaded parking.

reviews.title: Clean,friendly......
reviews.text: Cons: First floor rooms are a bit musty; the entrance is near a Home Depot and sometimes the traffic is constant; the surrounding area is a bit tired with only Denny's, Walgreens and Home Depot and Tri Rail as "walkable".

aka: La Quinta Inn & Suites Deerfield Beach i-95 Hotel Deerfield Beach
description: NEW! Samsung Flat-panel TVs with 30 channels of HD programming. Easy-access Plug-and-Play feature makes it simple to connect electronics.Stay at the La Quinta Inn & Suites Deerfield Beach I-95 at Hillsboro West just one mile from Boca Raton and within two miles of picturesque Atlantic beaches. Fort Lauderdale International Airport is a short 20-mile drive from the hotel. Tee off at nearby Deer Creek Golf Course or enjoy a day of shopping at Town Center Mall or Festival Flea Market. Quiet Waters Park, Butterfly World, and Mizner Park are also easily accessible from this hotel. Relax in our tropically landscaped courtyard before stepping into the refreshing heated outdoor pool. Work out in the onsite fitness center and enjoy a delicious Free Bright Side BreakfastTM each morning. All rooms include free high-speed Internet access, a microwave, refrigerator, and much more!
